text: Tomodachi Collection is a life and social simulator video game created for the Nintendo DS by Nintendo SPD. The video game is a prequel to the video game Tomodachi Collection: New Life or Tomodachi Life in other countries. The video game is only available in Japan for Japan DS's. This game features Nintendo's avatars featured on the Wii called Miis. == Gameplay == The game first starts the player on an empty island. On the island, you are to give the island a name. Afterwards, you must give your island a look-alike Mii that looks like you. Then you will feed them, and give them another Mii to live with. After this is complete, the player is allowed to make up to 100 Miis to unlock other parts of the island such as an interior or clothing store. The game does not end, and you can play for as long as you want. title: Tomodachi Collection
